readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.39/f Elliott 500/p Elliott: 50s/2 5/farmer 3 9 0 Elliott 1 5 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 400/faceDirection Elliott 2/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "@！請進。"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -2 0 0/pause 500/speak Elliott "歡迎光臨寒……舍。"/faceDirection Elliott 0/speak Elliott "這是我的書桌。我大部分時間都花在這上面。"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Elliott "從我懂事起，我就想當作家了。我跟你說過沒？#$b#所以我才自己住在這裡。我發現獨自住在海邊有助於文學靈感的誕生……$s"/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "家裡人都說我瘋了……說我永遠都不可能當上作家。#$b#你相信嗎？他們說「每個成功作家的背後都有1000個悲慘的失敗者」。多悲觀吶……真讓人難受。"/pause 700/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Elliott "我從你眼睛裡就能看出來……你相信我， @。你眼中有熱情。#$b#真是太好了！這就是我想要的……"/pause 500/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "$q 958699 null#問個問題……你喜歡什麼樣的書， @?#$r 958699 30 event_idea1#懸念#$r 958700 30 event_idea2#浪漫#$r 958701 30 event_idea3#科幻"/pause 500/speak Elliott "好！說我說得夠多了！"/pause 400/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "唔……你應該很了解植物吧？"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "你能不能看看這盆玫瑰？它好像有點蔫。$7"/pause 400/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/pause 400/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 200/end dialogue Elliott "謝謝你陪我聊天……我會想想你說的話的。"
content.423502/f Elliott 1500/p Elliott: elliottPiano/-200 -1000/farmer 3 9 0 Elliott 8 4 0/skippable/positionOffset Elliott 32 16/animate Elliott false true 400 25 26 26 27 27 26 26 25 26 27 27 26 26 25/pause 1000/viewport 8 4 true/pause 24000/stopAnimation Elliott/showFrame Elliott 24/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer 4 0 0/showFrame Elliott 28/pause 1000/speak Elliott "啊……我就感覺到有人在那裡。$7"/pause 1000/showFrame Elliott 30/animate Elliott false false 200 28 29 30/playSound dwop/pause 1000/question fork1 "#真的很棒。#你彈了多久？"/fork howLong/pause 500/emote Elliott 32/speak Elliott "謝謝。我琴技不算太好，但我很開心。$h"/switchEvent elliottPianoJoin
content.howLong: pause 500/resetVariable/speak Elliott "噢，我也不確定……我從小就彈鋼琴了。$7#$b#我不算太好，但我很開心。"/switchEvent elliottPianoJoin
content.elliottPianoJoin: pause 800/showFrame Elliott 0/animate Elliott false true 220 0 1 2 3/playSound woodyStep/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/pause 120/positionOffset Elliott 0 8/stopAnimation Elliott/faceDirection Elliott 2/pause 500/move Elliott 1 0 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1500/showFrame Elliott 31/pause 800/emote Elliott 28/pause 800/speak Elliott "我夜以繼日想要完成我的書……我都快瘋了。 @。$s"/showFrame Elliott 4/pause 800/move Elliott -2 0 0/pause 800/speak Elliott "我唯一的消遣就只有隨性彈首曲子。$7"/pause 600/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Elliott "工作實在太多了！而且我的存款也漸漸見底了。$7#$b#有時候我真想拋棄一切，像你一樣當個農夫。$h"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/question fork1 "#當農夫也一樣艱難。#過來農場生活吧，我需要幫忙。"/fork extraHelp/pause 500/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "你說得對……事不關己所以才會說這種話。$8"/move Elliott 0 1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "我的意思是想要逃離這陰暗潮濕的監牢，去享受一點真正的生活……僅此而已。$s"/animate Elliott true true 100 31/pause 800/emote Elliott 28/pause 500/speak Elliott "*唉*……抱歉讓你聽我嘮叨了，我三不五時就得跟別人吐吐苦水。$7"/pause 500/stopAnimation Elliott/showFrame Elliott 4/pause 600/faceDirection Elliott 3/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.extraHelp: pause 500/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "真的嗎？$8"/faceDirection Elliott 1/pause 400/speak Elliott "但我的小說不能棄坑啊。都快寫完一半了。$7"/animate Elliott true true 100 31/pause 800/emote Elliott 28/pause 500/speak Elliott "*唉*……抱歉讓你聽我嘮叨了。我三不五時就得跟別人吐吐苦水。$7"/pause 500/stopAnimation Elliott/showFrame Elliott 4/pause 600/faceDirection Elliott 3/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
